text: Muso ʙa sumo mu'cizahoi ravsan ovard, ki dalolatkunanda ʙar sidqi ust. Ba monandi tufon, malax, saʙusk va qurʙoqqa va ƣajr az in on ci ki Alloh dar Qur'oni azim zikr namudaast. Bo vucudi in, sumo pas az raftani Muso ʙa va'dagohi Parvardigoras, gusolaro ma'ʙudi xud girifted. Va sumo sitamgor ʙuded
